meanings.definition: The quality or state of being disruptive.
meanings.sent1: Her disruptivenesses in class made it hard for others to focus.
meanings.sent2: The disruptivenesses of the loud construction work could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The disruptivenesses of the mischievous puppy was both cute and chaotic.
meanings.sent4: The disruptivenesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The disruptivenesses of the alarm clock jolted him awake every morning.

meanings.definition: The tendency to cause disturbance or interruption.
meanings.sent1: The disruptivenesses of the toddler's tantrum disrupted the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The disruptivenesses of the traffic jam delayed everyone's arrival.
meanings.sent3: The disruptivenesses of the squirrel stealing birdseed was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The disruptivenesses of the unexpected power outage caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The disruptivenesses of the barking dog echoed through the neighborhood.
